name: Chatbot Arena
description: Community-driven evaluation for LLM chatbots based on human preference
methodology: Bradley-Terry model based on human votes

metrics.name: Arena Score
metrics.description: Elo-like rating based on pairwise win rates

metrics.name: Win Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of wins against other models

dimensions.name: Style-Adjusted
dimensions.description: Performance adjusted for style factors (length, formatting)
